explains: n. 歇斯底里；（众人的）狂热情绪的爆发；癔症
wordGroup: mass hysteria 集体歇斯底里；集体发疯

sentences.en: She felt an anxiety bordering on hysteria.
sentences.cn: 她感觉到一种近乎歇斯底里的焦虑。

sentences.en: All the lights went off, and mass hysteria broke out.
sentences.cn: 所有的灯都熄灭了，大家变得歇斯底里起来了。

sentences.en: No one could help getting carried away by the hysteria.
sentences.cn: 歇斯底里发作起来谁也无法控制自己。
